name: Button Hell
description:
Lots of buttons... but you gotta find the key button that opens the door and if youre wrong.. ... .. . well..  you die i guess. 

This Game is Weird.... -ly fun.. haha..    

Made in 1 week for Brakeys Game Jam.. but i was late by an Hour.. :[] ... so.. err.. well..

Cool.

+Sfx and bugfixes
